content: light green 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet increase around 9 3 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 12 4 5 single_crochet around 12 - slip_stitch f/o leave long tail for sewing legs x 2 - begin with light green - chains are not included in the total stitch count 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet increase around 9 3 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 12 4 3 single_crochet increase around 15 5 single_crochet around 15 6 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet around 18 7 slip_stitch chain 6 skip 6 6 single_crochet slip_stitch stop 8 18 total - f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 5/7 large leaf - begin with dark green 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 8 3 3 single_crochet increase around 10 4 2 single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet around 12 5 6 single_crochet around 12 7 single_crochet decrease single_crochet around 9 - slip_stitch f/o leave long tail for sewing small leaf - begin with dark green 1 work 6 single_crochet in a magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet increase single_crochet around 8 3 single_crochet around 8 4 3 single_crochet increase around 10 5 single_crochet around 10 6 3 single_crochet decrease around 8 - slip_stitch f/o leave long tail for sewing sword - begin with brown - remember that stitches who share an underline should be worked in the same stitch 1 chain 9 skip 1st chain from hook 7 single_crochet increase working on the opposite side of the chains 2 single_crochet double_crochet chain 1 slip_stitch 2 slip_stitch 2 single_crochet chain 1 slip_stitch 20 2 chain 1 slip_stitch chain 1 2 single_crochet 2 slip_stitch slip_stitch chain 1 double_crochet 2 slip_stitch stop 12 23 total - f/o leave long tail for sewing copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 6/7 assembly more pictures are included on the next page sew the belly patch onto the front of the body sew the large leaf onto the left side of the top of the head sew the small leaf onto the right side of the top of the head sew the arms onto either side of the body stuffing as you go sew the legs onto either side of the body stuffing as you go use black yarn to embroider two eyes onto the front of the body use white yarn to embroider shines onto the eyes cut off a 15 length of black yarn and remove one of the plies use the remaining plies to embroider a mouth onto the front of the body sew the sword onto the left arm copyright © 2023 icrochetthings 7/7 copyright © 2023 icrochetthings
